name: Executioner
description: Deal an extra 1.5x Attack when the enemy is under 20% Health

name: Master of Knives
description: Daggers provide +2 Attack

name: Wall of Thorns
description: 25% of blocked melee damage is now inflicted back upon the attacker

name: Dead-eye
description: Steady Shots now have a 95% chance to hit

name: Polearm Expert
description: Spears provide +2 Defense

name: Bare-knuckle
description: Deal an extra +5 Damage while unarmed or using Unarmed Weapons

name: Bloodrush
description: 1.5x Attack and 1.5x Defense while under 20% Health

name: Skilled Swordsman
description: All Swords provide +2 Attack

name: Expert Archer
description: Projectile weapons provide +2 Attack

name: Master of Heavy Weaponry
description: Axes, Maces, and Warhammers provide +4 Attack

name: Soul Sapper
description: Heal for some unblocked damage

name: Demonic Influence
description: Passively inflict 1 penetrating damage per turn

name: Draining Aura
description: Passively inflict 1 unblocked Damage to the enemy's Core Health per turn

name: Student of Knowledge
description: All Consumable Move Items have 2x Uses

name: Heartless
description: Deal extra damage against Explorer and Human-type enemies

name: Fluidity
description: Deal extra damage for each consecutive combat turn you don't take damage in

name: Battering Ram
description: Boost your attack stat by 25% of your defense stat for the first five turns of combat

name: Critical Eye
description: Critical Hits now deal 3x Damage

name: All-Seeing
description: Gain full immunity to all blindness effects

name: Missing Weapon Arm
description: Equipment in Weapon slot is 75% less effective

name: Missing Offhand Arm
description: Equipment in Offhand slot is 75% less effective

name: Missing Left Leg
description: Dodge moves are 50% less effective, always move last

name: Missing Right Leg
description: Dodge moves are 50% less effective, always move last

name: Prosthetic Weapon Arm
description: Equipment in Weapon slot is 15% less effective

name: Prosthetic Offhand Arm
description: Equipment in Offhand slot is 15% less effective

name: Prosthetic Left Leg
description: Dodge moves are 10% less effective

name: Prosthetic Right Leg
description: Dodge moves are 10% less effective

name: Enhanced Prosthetic Weapon Arm
description: Equipment in Weapon slot is 25% more effective

name: Enhanced Prosthetic Offhand Arm
description: Equipment in Offhand slot is 25% more effective

name: Enhanced Prosthetic Left Leg
description: Dodge moves are 25% more effective, always move first when combined with Enhanced Prosthetic Right Leg

name: Enhanced Prosthetic Right Leg
description: Dodge moves are 25% more effective, always move first when combined with Enhanced Prosthetic Left Leg
